short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Gun Mayhem Unblocked right on Chrome™ Browser! Offline and Popup Version, without internet required!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Gun Mayhem 2 This is a crazy shooting game where you have to deal with your enemies before they kill you and end your streak. It can also be played as a multiplayer game with one of your friends on the same computer. You start by standing on some platforms and your enemy or enemies will be there too. The goal here is to not get shot out or you’ll lose. Collect power-ups to give you a boost in the game and make sure you outplay even the hardest AI difficulty levels that the game has to offer.

Controls: 
Arrows = Move / Jump, Z = Shoot, X = Dynamite
long.en_AU,en_US,vi:
Gun Mayhem 2 This is a crazy shooting game where you have to deal with your enemies before they kill you and end your streak. It can also be played as a multiplayer game with one of your friends on the same computer. You start by standing on some platforms and your enemy or enemies will be there too. The goal here is to not get shot out or you’ll lose. Collect power-ups to give you a boost in the game and make sure you outplay even the hardest AI difficulty levels that the game has to offer.

Controls: 
Arrows = Move / Jump, Z = Shoot, X = Dynamite
